patches.title: Balance Update - Item Adjustments
patches.summary: Balance adjustments to several items and weapons based on community feedback.

balance.text: [[item:anvil|Anvil]] now applies to ALL stat upgrades, not just damage
[[item:beefy_ring|Beefy Ring]] scaling reduced from 25% to 20% per 100 HP
[[weapon:sniper_rifle|Sniper Rifle]] base damage increased from 20 to 22

bug_fixes.text: Fixed [[item:anvil|Anvil]] not applying correctly to weapon upgrades in some cases

patches.raw_notes:
Balance Update 1.0.18

- Anvil now applies to ALL stat upgrades
- Beefy Ring scaling reduced from 25% to 20%
- Sniper Rifle base damage: 20 -> 22
- Fixed Anvil upgrade application bug

patches.title: New Content - Winter Update
patches.summary: New items, weapons, and quality of life improvements for the holidays!

balance.text: [[item:beefy_ring|Beefy Ring]] now shows damage bonus in tooltip

bug_fixes.text: Fixed rare crash when opening inventory during boss fights
Fixed [[weapon:sniper_rifle|Sniper Rifle]] projectiles not piercing correctly

patches.raw_notes:
Winter Update 1.0.15

New Content:

- Added Sniper Rifle weapon

Bug Fixes:

- Fixed Sniper Rifle piercing

QoL:

patches.title: Launch Patch - Bug Fixes
patches.summary: Critical bug fixes and balance adjustments based on launch feedback.

bug_fixes.text: Fixed game freezing when collecting too many items at once
Fixed audio cutting out during extended play sessions

other.text: Added accessibility options for colorblind players
